title: Vampires Are Forever
description: Inez Urso is not pleased. After dragging herself out of bed and running to the airport at 5 am, Thomas Argeneau has the nerve to ignore her! She's gone to all this trouble, and disrupted her carefully planned life, and he acts like she's not even there. Once she tracks him down she's going to give him a piece of her mind.
author: Lynsay Sands
